Package org.sql2o.tools

internal tools.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ClassUtils  
    FeatureDetector
    Detects whether optional sql2o features are available.
    IOUtils
    Created with IntelliJ IDEA.
    NamedParameterStatement
    This class wraps around a PreparedStatement and allows the programmer to set parameters by name instead of by index.
    ResultSetUtils
    Utilities for ResultSet.
    UnderscoreToCamelCase
    Takes a string formatted like: 'my_string_variable' and returns it as: 'myStringVariable'
